ref.mixed-citation: van Wezel EM, de Bruijne J, Damman K, Bijmolen M, van den Berg AP, Verschuuren EAM, et al. Sofosbuvir add-on to ribavirin treatment for chronic hepatitis E virus infection in solid organ transplant recipients does not result in sustained virological response. Open Forum Infect Dis. 2019;6(8).
